Title: The One Where They Build a House
Plot: Michael is driven crazy by Gob when he impresses the board as the new company figurehead due to Michael's legal troubles. Meanwhile, George Sr. is arrested in Mexico for a crime Oscar committed, and Buster witnesses something that utterly shocks him.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Christian Duguay, Thomas Jane, Zitto Kazann
